class_notes: Online with synchronous sessions TBD. Intensives TBA
course_description: Learners examine system level approaches and underlying public health principles to achieve equitable population health outcomes. Data, policies, and population characteristics are used to assess the complexities associated with resource allocation and responses to diverse population health needs.
prerequisites: NRSG 708D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2427, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: C. Coburn, Status: Open
